parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the Guntamatic Heating System

parameter.name: key
parameter.label: Key
parameter.description: Optional, but required to read protected parameters and to control the Guntamatic Heating System. The key needs to be reqested from Guntamatic support.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Interval the Guntamatic Heating System is polled in seconds. Default: 60s

parameter.name: encoding
parameter.label: Encoding
parameter.description: Code page used by the Guntamatic Heating System. Default: 'windows-1252'
